```{r setup, include=F, warnings=F, echo=F}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(warning = FALSE, message = FALSE, echo=FALSE)
library(plotly)
```

```{r}
glass <- read.csv2("glass.csv", header=TRUE, sep=",")
head(glass)
```

```{r}
# Transform features into numeric
features <- names(glass)[names(glass) != "Type"]
glass[features] <- lapply(glass[features], as.numeric)

# Transform label as categorical
glass$Type <- as.factor(glass$Type)

unique(glass$Type)
```


```{r}
cor_matrix <- cor(glass[, 1:9])  # Compute correlation matrix

# Create a plotly heatmap
heatmap <- plot_ly(
  z = cor_matrix,
  x = colnames(cor_matrix),
  y = colnames(cor_matrix),
  type = "heatmap",
  colorscale = "YlOrRd"
)

# Add labels and title
heatmap <- heatmap %>% layout(
  xaxis = list(title = "Features"),
  yaxis = list(title = "Features"),
  title = "Correlation Heatmap"
)

# Display the heatmap
heatmap

```
